titleStmt.title: The quatorse, or, The sorrowful lamentation of the Preston gentlemen in the press-yard, for the loss of P.W. made by the author, while he was playing at picket ; in imitation of Habby Simson.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
First line of text: The press-yard now may cry Alace.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
